en:
Congratulations! You have deduced your way through the first scenario of Chapter 2 of The Rise of the Golden Idol. Please treat your intellect to a well-deserved rest. 

The Rise of the Golden Idol will release worldwide, with 20 scenarios to uncover and untangle on November 12, 2024. 
Wishlist the game to prepare for what’s coming next. Be ready for anything!
—Team Idol
